nodes.text: The Stargazer Uprising occurred after the Je'daii Journeyer Dalien Brock faked his own death in the old Ruins on the planet Tython and later resurfaced. His sister and fellow Journeyer Lanoree Brock was tasked with stopping his plans to discover and activate a Hypergate with dark matter. The Je'daii Council feared this would lead to the formation of a black hole and the destruction of the system.

After fighting in Greenwood Station on Nox, Dalien planted evidence of Je'daii cooperation and even kiled a set of officials, which sparked a war between two domes. Lanoree Brock and Tre Sana escaped the doomed dome together and eventually caught up with Dalien on Sunspot. After he shot her through the chest on Sunspot, she recovered using alchemy of the flesh. Finally Lanoree, killed her brother in the old ruins and returned to the Je'daii ending the crisis, though several of the benefactors of the Stargazers survived and vanished.
